dcterms:creator: J. Oh
V. Chockalingam
S. Singh
H. Lee
dcterms:description: The Goal-Search environment is adapted from previous work, where the agent starts in a fixed position within a randomly generated maze with two randomly positioned goal states. The agent observes an indicator that tells it which goal to pursue, requiring memory to navigate correctly.
dcterms:title: Goal-Search Environment

dcterms:creator: Michał Kempka
Marek Wydmuch
Grzegorz Runc
Jakub Toczek
Wojciech Ja´skowski
dcterms:description: The Doom environment is a 3D maze where the agent must navigate using visual cues provided by colored torches that indicate which goal to pursue. The agent receives rewards based on reaching the correct goal.
dcterms:title: Doom Environment

dcterms:creator: J. Oh
V. Chockalingam
S. Singh
H. Lee
dcterms:description: Maze environments used for testing the Neural Map architecture, where agents must navigate through various maze configurations to achieve specific goals.
dcterms:title: Maze Environments
